EmailTemplate.name: Enrolment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Enrolment Confirmation - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for providing your enrolment documentation to Candidature Operations team for processing.
We would like to confirm that your enrolment has now been finalised.
You can proceed with setting up your student email account https://account-registration.monash.edu/and completing the online enrolment Questionnaire via WES (Web Enrolment System) https://my.monash.edu.au/wes/ to obtain your student ID card from Monash Connect. For further information on Student ID cards, please visit: https://www.monash.edu/connect/id-cards
Should you have any concerns or require further assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listeningâ€¦.your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
